meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or constituting a preference or partiality.
meanings.sent1: She always chose her favorite color first, showing a preferential treatment.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's preferential treatment towards certain students was evident.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed a preferential interest in the red ball over the blue one.
meanings.sent4: The preferential seating at the concert made the experience unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The preferential treatment of VIP guests made everyone else envious.

meanings.sent1: He had a preferential liking for chocolate ice cream over vanilla.
meanings.sent2: The preferential treatment given to the loyal customers was appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The preferential treatment of the dog towards its favorite toy was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The preferential treatment of sunlight over shade made the flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The preferential treatment of the main character in the story made the plot more interesting.
